name: databank-graphic-design
description: Frontend application for Databank, a repository of Graphic Design educational resources
author: Ruben Rodriguez

scripts.build-css: cat style/fonts.css style/layout.css style/modules.css style/theme.css > dist/site.css
scripts.watch-css: catw style/fonts.css style/layout.css style/modules.css style/theme.css -o dist/site.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js-lib & npm run watch-js-bundle
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-js-lib & npm run build-css & npm run build-js-bundle
